oai_dc:dc.dc:title: McGavock Chapel AME: fieldnotes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: McGavock Chapel African Methodist Episcopal Church
Fieldnotes on McGavock Chapel AME Church in Charlotte, Tennessee. Notes document the location of the church and provide a brief architectural description of the building.

McGavock Chapel African Methodist Episcopal Church is a rural African American church in Charlotte, Tennessee. The original building is no longer standing. According to the church cornerstone, the current concrete-block building dates to 1950. Reverend J. G. Henderson served as pastor at the time of construction.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African American Churches -- Tennessee
